replies.bodyText: Good catch, the reflective item was only instantiated and not registered.
replies.author: machi1990

timeline.message:
Bump mysql-connector-java from 8.0.18 to 8.0.19

Bumps [mysql-connector-java](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-connector-j) from 8.0.18 to 8.0.19.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-connector-j/releases)
- [Changelog](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-connector-j/blob/release/8.0/CHANGES)
- [Commits](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-connector-j/compare/8.0.18...8.0.19)

Signed-off-by: dependabot-preview[bot] <support@dependabot.com>

Bump mysql-connector-java from 8.0.18 to 8.0.19
